thread.title: 'Goldbergs' Bleeps 20 Swears in 40 Seconds as Bev Goes Berserk: Watch the Sneak Peek!
thread.title_full: 'Goldbergs' Bleeps 20 Swears in 40 Seconds as Bev Goes Berserk: Watch the Sneak Peek!

title: 'Goldbergs' Bleeps 20 Swears in 40 Seconds as Bev Goes Berserk: Watch the Sneak Peek!
text:
Nicole Kidman Explains Her Awkward Oscars Seal Clap 
Bev is taken aback and tells the family she doesn't use blue language. But Murray is quick to disagree: "You swear more than the Beverly Hills Cop guy, Eddie Money ." Bev, however, is not convinced, and replies, "I do not swear like Eddie Money." (Apparently, they're not big Eddie Murphy fans.) Best and Worst Movie Remakes 
This leads to a montage of the many, many times she has used a (censored) expletive on the show, including a shot of her exclaiming, "We're going to Milli Vanilli the f--k out of that musical." Other memorable moments include the harried mom swiping candy from a young trick-or-treater, and donning shades Ã  la Tom Cruise in Risky Business. 10 Most Devastating TV Deaths of 2016 
Watch the hilarious scene above. The Goldbergs airs on ABC Wednesdays at 8 p.m. ET.
